src.stt.utils module¶

Description:

Helper functions that are used in multiple places

class src.stt.utils.DataCollatorCTCWithPadding(processor: Wav2Vec2Processor, padding: Union[bool, str] = True, max_length: Optional[int] = None, max_length_labels: Optional[int] = None, pad_to_multiple_of: Optional[int] = None, pad_to_multiple_of_labels: Optional[int] = None)¶

Bases: object

Data collator that will dynamically pad the inputs received.

class src.stt.utils.EearlyStoppingCallbackAfterNumEpochs(start_epoch: int, *args, **kwargs)¶

Bases: EarlyStoppingCallback

Callback to stop training after a number of epochs. Inherits from EarlyStoppingCallback.

src.stt.utils.load_trainer(model: Union[HubertForCTC, Wav2Vec2ForCTC], data_collator: DataCollatorCTCWithPadding, training_args: TrainingArguments, train_ds: Dataset, val_ds: Dataset, processor: Wav2Vec2Processor) → Trainer¶

Parameters:

  • model (Union[HubertForCTC, Wav2Vec2ForCTC]) – Model to train

  • data_collator (DataCollatorCTCWithPadding) – Data collator for the model

  • training_args (TrainingArguments) – Training arguments for the training process

  • train_ds (Dataset) – Training dataset

  • val_ds (Dataset) – Validation dataset

  • processor (Wav2Vec2Processor) – Processor for the model
